segments.text: The water spilling from the sink is like a warning sign that nobody is heeding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a little desperate for someone to notice the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks so peaceful, polishing her plate, and I admire her focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the two kids, and my heart drops at the sight of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is belligerently reaching into the cookie jar, completely oblivious to the danger around him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His precarious position on the stool is enough to send shivers down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him, with her eager hand raised, is so innocent yet part of this risky scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels surreal to witness this everyday scene morphing into something problematic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the serene garden outside and the chaos within the kitchen is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to rush in and make everything right, but I canâ€™t.
segments.speaker: PAR
